title: Walking Distance To West Elm, Whole Foods & Galleria! Renovated
posting_body: We offer you the blend of two styles of living, featuring both traditional garden and modern mid-rise styles.
Choose from 1 & 2 bedroom apartments that are designed with your comfort and style in mind.
Our recently upgraded apartments feature hardwood-style flooring, stainless steel appliances, sleek cabinetry, and more!
Relax and socialize at one of our two salt-water swimming pools, or take your canine friend to our fenced-in dog park.

From the moment you move in, you'll be a part of a gated community located within walking distance of the Galleria Mall and its world-class shopping and dining--such as West Elm, Whole Foods, and Apple.
We're just a few blocks east of the Dallas North Tollway and one mile north of Interstate 635/LBJ Freeway
